TITLE/EDITION Forensic Notes (Davis's Notes) 
By: Connie Darnell BSN RN (Author), Christine Michel PhD BSc RN DABFN (Author)
Series: Davis's Notes
Spiral-bound: 352 pages
Publisher: F.A. Davis Company; 1 edition (March 16, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0803626525
ISBN-13: 978-0803626522
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book




A DAVIS'S NOTES BOOK!

This spiral-bound, pocket guide is the perfect quick reference for healthcare providers who collect forensic evidence from patients in any setting.

You will find information about specific forensic topics, step-by-step procedures for retrieving and preserving evidence, and the best practices to follow to promote patient safety.
